version_description:
1. Fix the custom animation cannot be deleted
2. Optimize the synchronization of widgets and App information
3. Add some animations
4. Optimize performance and stability

Recent updates:
1. Added charging record widget (requires iOS14 and above)
2. Add some charging animations
3. Fix the display problem of charging history
Note: The charging animation automatically pops up when charging requires the support of iOS14 and above. Follow the animation automation tutorial in the App and set it appropriately to automatically pop up the screensaver animation when charging.

1. Add several charging animations
2. Optimize the animation logic for automatic display of charging
3. Adapt to iOS15 system, iPhone13 series, new iPad series
4. Optimize the automatic adding tutorial
Note: The charging animation automatically pops up when charging needs to be supported by iOS14 and above. Follow the animation automation tutorial in the App and set it appropriately to automatically pop up the screensaver animation when charging.
